description: Scaffold the Creation filesystem and core descriptor (creation.yaml).
Populate V0 Functional Spec in creation/03-v0.
Populate V0 Demo Script & Acceptance Criteria in creation/03-v0.
Design CreateOS-native session startup (Session Manager, consent, persistent memory, audit trace).
Prototype Session Manager service with per-session tokens and consent-linked connector handles.
Implement persistent, append-only Creation memory API with versioned entries and manual compaction.
Ship Resume Creation UX and end-to-end bootstrap + revocation tests (index validation, audit trace).
